description: Retention of existing building at 56-64 Leonard Street (Development House; including internal alterations; erection of a new 3, part 4, and part 7 storey mixed-use building (plus basement) along Paul Street and Kiffen Street to provide; 575 sqm of Class a1/A3 accomodation; 3698 sqm of class B1 accomodation; and 9 residential units (6 x 2 bed, 2 x 3 bed, and 1 x 4 bed); 2 off street disabled car-parking space and 90 cycle parking spaces.
